summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 30th Avenue Northeast from East 55th Street to Railroad Avenue as laid off and established by Ordinance No. 22601, all in the City of Seattle,; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
